function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to regular sporting or exercise routines","Impact":"Challenges to the immune system and physical health, possible commencement or exacerbation of sedentary lifestyle-related diseases","Mitigation":"Promotion of alternative at-home exercise routines, provision of online fitness classes","Technologies":"Virtual fitness platforms, wearable fitness technology","People":"Individuals with limited access to exercise facilities, sedentary individuals","Owner":"Fitness providers, health organizations"},{"Description":"Mental health impacts of lack of access to exercise and physical activity","Impact":"Compound stress and anxiety, impact on psychological well-being","Mitigation":"Promotion of mental well-being resources, provision of virtual fitness and wellness programs","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps","People":"Individuals experiencing isolation, stress, and anxiety","Owner":"Mental health organizations, community organizations"},{"Description":"Over-reporting bias of physical activity in the study","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of physical activity levels during COVID-19","Mitigation":"Use of multiple data collection methods, validation of self-reported activity through wearable fitness technology","Technologies":"Wearable fitness technology, activity trackers","People":"Researchers, study participants","Owner":"Research institutions, fitness technology companies"}]}
